meanings.definition: The upper edge of the side or bulwark of a boat or ship.
meanings.sent1: The sailors sat on the gunwale, enjoying the view of the sea.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to lean too far over the gunwale while fishing.
meanings.sent3: The seagull perched on the gunwale, pretending to be the captain of the ship.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight reflected off the gunwale, creating a shimmering path on the water.
meanings.sent5: The salty spray splashed against the gunwale, leaving a trail of droplets.
